title: style chicken livers with parsley salad and pitta
description: Chicken livers are packed with flavour and a cheap option too. Try them with pitta and salad for a super tasty lunch. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.
ingredients: 450g/1lb chicken livers, trimmed of any sinews and fat, drained and patted dry, chopped into bite-sized pieces
½ lemon, juice only (zest used below)
1 bunch parsley, leaves roughly chopped, stalk very finely chopped
½ lemon, zest only (juice used above)
